channel.title: Item Editing
channel.description: How do i change how an item looks when its in your inventory and when you're wearing it? And also if anyone knows how to change the values of items would be helpful too.

item.title: Item Editing
item.dc:creator: @Sidewindscape Sidewindscape
item.description:
@Sidewindscape wrote:

i have no idea what you just said but it sounds complicated… I dont think ill worry about the visual side of it now haha. are the values any easier?

Read full topic

item.title: Item Editing
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Do you mean the stance or the actual item? If it’s the actual item you have to get the model for the new weapon then add/make the ints and add them into class8.java client-sided

Read full topic
